short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring a burst of cuteness to your new tab with the Hello Kitty Live Wallpaper!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring the iconic Hello Kitty in a playful and vibrant design, this extension adds charm to your browsing experience. Easily access your favorite websites with popular shortcuts, add custom links, and stay organized with the integrated calendar and clock. Effortlessly search the web with your default search engine.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Enjoy Hello Kitty’s adorable and colorful design.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Quickly visit your most-loved websites.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Personalize your tab with the links you use most.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Stay organized with the integrated calendar and clock.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Search the web with ease using your default search engine.
Explore more extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall quickly via the provided links.
